snippet: European Central Bank Governing Council member Ignazio Visco called on Saturday for European Union countries to create a common budget for defence, security, research and infrastructure....

headline.print_headline: ECB's Visco Urges Common EU Budget for Defence, Research
headline.main: ECB's Visco Urges Common EU Budget for Defence, Research

lead_paragraph: European Central Bank Governing Council member Ignazio Visco called on Saturday for European Union countries to create a common budget for defence, security, research and infrastructure.
